articles.description: Plane crash survivor Austin Hatch suited up and was honored by Michigan on senior day.

articles.description: The Jayhawks are able to control their fate in the Big 12 race once again, after rallying to defeat West Virginia at home on Saturday.
articles.headline: Kansas' wild win sets up a huge week in the Big 12

images.caption: Devonte' Graham and the Jayhawks pulled even with Texas Tech atop the Big 12 standings Saturday. Kansas will visit Texas Tech on Feb. 24.
images.name: West Virginia vs. Kansas (Devonte' Graham #4 of the Kansas Jayhawks shoots over James Bolden #3 of the West Virginia Mountaineers) [576x324]

articles.description: KJ Feagin and Henry Caruso scored 18 points apiece and Emmanuel Ndumanya had 15 points and nine rebounds to help Santa Clara beat Pacific 72-68 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Feagin, Caruso help Santa Clara beat Pacific 72-68

articles.description: Elijah Stewart scored 28 points to lead Southern California to a 72-59 victory over Oregon State on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Stewart scores 28 points, leads USC past Oregon State 72-59
